[Listen] Amelie Lens Made Her BBC Radio 1 Essential Mix Debut

Posted by Brittany Prevost on April 8, 2020

On Saturday, April 4, 2020, the techno world rejoiced as Amelie Lens made her BBC Radio 1 Essential Mix debut. The techno Goddess unleashed an astonishing 4-hour mix, marking the first installment of this length since 1997. The Belgian producer took this monumental occasion to feature a wave of unreleased tracks from her LENSKE imprint. In addition, she played new releases from artists like AIROD, Setaoc Mass, Ahl Iver and Lukaz Firtzer. Be sure to check out the mix and official tracklist below. Fair warning, you'll be blown away by her undeniable skill!

Official Tracklist:

1. Thomas P. Heckman – Ghosts (Trope Recordings)
2. Casual Treatment – Prisoner of Life (Dusk & Haze)
3. Lewis Fautzi – Wounds of Deadly Hate (Faut Section)
4. Zeitgeber – Seventeen Zero Four (Stroboscopic Artefacts)
5. Cyborg 95 – Cyborgs Theme (Lobster Theremin)
6. AWB – Daze (Vaerel Records)
7. Farceb – Silver Glow (Warok Music)
8. Random XS – Give Your Body (Delsin Records)
9. Subjected – Nastes (Prosthetic Press)
10. Adam X – Midnight Sun (BITE)
11. Eric Axelsson – Gestalt (Uncage)
12. Earwax – Ypno (Planet Rhtyhm)
